message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper is about natural language processing and specifically focuses on sentence modeling and semantic textual similarity. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also uses deep learning techniques, which makes cs.LG (Machine Learning) another likely category. Additionally, the paper involves the use of word embeddings, which falls under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also deals with similarity and relation between sentences, which could be categorized under cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper uses a novel approach for sentence modeling, which could be categorized under cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
